text:
We have the Jakarta Service installed on NT and the IIS from Microsoft.
When we use the "logoff all users.." under NT. The service stoped automatically 
and we can not use java server pages. When we only lock the NT machine the 
service is running.

What can i do, that the service not stoped, when we logged out, because an other 
user need the machine.

Thanks

Rainer Struck
creator: Rainer.Struck@T-Systems.de
nacho@apache.org
text:
This is a bug of JDK 1.3.0, it seems that in JDK 1.3.1 the java command has a 
new switch to contral that "feature".. not a bug of the Tomcat NTService at 
all..
